column5: Has anyone stayed there? Any opinions
No problems at all. That said, I've not been to Dryden in some 10 yrears, so, things could well have changed.
Clean and a little dated, think 1980's. We have never had an issue there and we have stayed there 4-5 times. Later, Jay
Thanks looking to stay Friday before our Saturday stay on Gullrock in august
There is also Northside Motel in Vermilion Bay 708-227-5339 located just West of the 105 on the 17.
Stayed at Northside a couple of times motel is fine supper options a little scarce
We've stayed at the Riverview Lodge in Dryden a few times nice place with a restaurant.

That's part of our plan too - we love the restaurant at the Riverview Lodge so that's our Friday evening dinner before heading up to Ear Falls first thing Saturday morning. We stay at the Holiday Inn Express - it makes us smarter and better fishermen.
